txt.en: 'Some of our kinsmen have gone on to the Mournshaws to scout the way. Perhaps you should bring this sigil to Daervunn at Echad Daervunn...perhaps he has come upon some knowledge of this Hunter King.\n\n'Echad Daervunn lies far to the south of here in the northern reaches of the Mournshaws.'
'What is this? The Hunter King? It is a name we have heard rumoured, but there is not much more I can tell you. Perhaps you can help us find the truth.'
'You should speak with Daervunn in the Mournshaws, [placeholder]. He may have learned something of this Hunter King.'
According to Prestadir, the medallion you found says something about a Hunter King and the Mournshaws.
Talk to Daervunn at Echad Daervunn in the Mournshaws
Daervunn is at Echad Daervunn in the Mournshaws, far to the south of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nPrestadir suggested you take the sigil you found to Daervunn in the Mournshaws.
